title: Broken Sword 5 The Serpent Curse (Episode 1/ Update 1 Patch/ GOG
description:
Hey guys, here broken sword 5 and the update 1 patch. This is the gog version of the game. All bonus content is included. Please help seed and hope you guys enjoy. Game Info and change log below.


============================================
Update 1 Patch Notes                               =
============================================

Upgrades your game to version 1.0 
Fixes the "no subtitles displayed during videos"bug 

============================================
Important, Please Read                              =
============================================

If you are getting an error message for the PC version about missing OpenAL32.dll, please download OpenAL from this link:  <a href="
http://files.gog.com/support/oalinst.zip" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://files.gog.com/support/oalinst.zip</a>
 <a href="
http://www.gog.com/forum/broken_sword_series/broken_sword_5_openal32dll_fix_please_read" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gog.com/forum/broken_sword_series/broken_sword_5_openal32dll_fix_please_read</a>

Includes Broken Sword 5: Episode 1 and Broken Sword 5: Episode 2 (release date: Q1 2014).
The latest explosive episode in the iconic Broken Sword series
Follow the adventure across Europe and beyond, in classic 2D hand-drawn locations
Immerse yourself in the rich storyline and interact with unforgettable characters
Experience the very best in adventure gaming: from unique puzzles and deft subterfuge to cipher solving and time-honoured detective work
